text: Clark Montgomery (born May 20, 1981) is an American Olympic eventing rider. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, but did not finish the individual competition as he retired during the cross-country stage. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1981 births Category:American male equestrians Category:Equestrians at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic equestrians of the United States
title: Clark Montgomery
